column2: "Na iyi ekyir no ɔbaa dɛ Ammonmba hɔn hen Nahas wui
column3: na ne ba bedzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
Mebɛyɛ Nahas ne ba Hanun ayamuyie
column4: osiandɛ n'egya yɛɛ me ayamuyie. Nna David somaa abɔfo dɛ wɔnkɛkyekye no werɛ wɔ n'egya ntsi. Na David no nkowaa baa Hanun nkyɛn wɔ Ammonmba asaase no do

column2: "Nna Ammonmba asafohemfo no see Hanun dɛ
column3: Ana edwen dɛ David dzi w'egya nyi ntsi na ɔasoma awerɛkyekyefo wɔ wo nkyɛn yi? Ana no nkowaa yi ammba wo nkyɛn dɛ wɔrobɔhwehwɛ asaase yi

column2: "Nna Hanun faa David no nkowaa no
column4: na otwitwaa hɔn ntar mu finimfin finimfin araa dze bodur hɔn nserɛekyir

column3: na ɔkɛkaa mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ mbarimba no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ David. Na ɔsomae ma wokehyiaa hɔn kwan; osiandɛ woegu mbarimba no enyim ase kɛse. Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column4: Hom ntsintsim wɔ Jeriko ma onkodu dɛ hom mbɔdwesa bofuw

column2: "Na aber a Ammonmba no hun dɛ hɔn ho abɔn David no
column3: Hanun na Ammonmba no wɔdze dwetɛ  talent   apem somae ma wɔdze kɛgyee Mesopotemia
column5: na Zoba ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo dɔm."

column3: na Maakahen na ne man dɔm; hɔn a wɔbae bɛkyeer nsera wɔ Medeba enyim. Na Ammonmba no fifii hɔn nkurow mu poon hɔnho hyiae

column4: na mbarimba akatakyi dɔm no nyinara ma wɔkɔree."

column3: na wɔbaabaa mpasuar wɔ kurow no mu kuropon ano: na ahemfo no a wɔbae no hɔnara nko na wɔtsenaa wɔ haban no mu."

column2: "Afei aber a Joab hun dɛ ɔko no wɔ n'enyim na n'ekyir no
column3: nna ɔpaa Israel mu mbarimba a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn nyinara mu bi
column4: na ɔmaa wɔdanee kehyiaa Siriafo no."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo nkaa no ɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ no nua Abishai nsa
column3: na wɔbaa hɔnho mu kɔr Ammonmba no do."
Sɛ Siriafo no yɛ dzen dodow ma me a
column4: ɔno bɔboa me: na sɛ Ammonmba no yɛ dzen dodow ma wo a

column3: na ma yɛnyɛ hɛnho mbarimba mma hɛn man
column4: na hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkurow no: na EWURADZE nyɛ dza oye wɔ n'enyiwa do."

column2: "Nna Joab na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no twee piin Siriafo no enyim dze kɔbɔɔ enyim; na Siriafo no guanee wɔ n'enyim."
"Na aber a Ammonmba no hun dɛ Siriafo no eguan no
column3: nna hɔn so woguanee wɔ no nua Abishai enyim
column4: na wɔkɛhɛɛn kurow no mu. Nna Joab baa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na aber a Siriafo no hun dɛ woegu wɔ Israel enyim no
column4: ma wɔkɔpoon Siriafo a wɔwɔ Esutsen egya no bae
column5: dɛ Hadadezer no dɔm safohen Sofak na odzi hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ David; na ɔpoon Israel nyinara hyiae
column5: na ɔbaa hɔn do mpasuar hyiaa hɔn. Dɛm ntsi aber a David baa mpasuar hyiaa Siriafo no

column2: "Na Siriafo no guanee wɔ Israel enyim
column3: na David kunkum Siriafo mu ntseaseanammufo no mu mpemesuon
column5: na okum dɔm safohen panyin Sofak."

column2: "Na aber a Hadadezer no nkowaa no hun dɛ woegu wɔ Israel enyim no
column4: na wɔsoom no: nkyii so Siriafo no ammpɛ dɛ wɔboa Ammonmba no bio."
